update.releaseNotes:
v3.3.3 - Changelog
New --- - Add missing description for Generic Farming Mode in Settings page.
Changed --- - Adjust delay timings for checkForPopups() and collectLoot().
Fixed --- - Fix entry condition for reloadAfterAttack() method. - Fix message log not resetting when restarting the bot. - Fix wrong SharedPreferences used for upper bound of randomized delay.
